function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unclear infection mechanism in indoor environments","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and spread of diseases","Mitigation":"Conducting studies to understand the infection mechanism, investigating infection cluster spaces, and experimenting with environmental factors","Technologies":"Air quality sensors, environmental monitoring systems","People":"Occupants of indoor environments, public health","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of specific ventilation guidelines","Impact":"Uncertainty in maintaining air quality and reducing disease transmission","Mitigation":"Developing industry-specific ventilation guidelines, implementing flexible ventilation systems","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, smart HVAC systems","People":"Building owners, facility managers","Owner":"Regulatory agencies, industry associations"}]}
